name: @anthonylzq/simba.js
description: set up a modern backend app by running one command

scripts.test: npm run rm && npm run test-express && npm run test-fastify
scripts.test-express: npm run rm-express && npm run cd-mv-example && node -r dotenv/config ./bin -N example/express -D 'This is a test using express' -a AnthonyLzq -e sluzquinosa@uni.pe -l mit -H && npm run rm-git-express
scripts.test-fastify: npm run rm-fastify && npm run cd-mv-example && node -r dotenv/config ./bin -N example/fastify -D 'This is a test using fastify' -a AnthonyLzq -e sluzquinosa@uni.pe -l mit -H -F && npm run rm-git-fastify
scripts.cd-mv-example: if [ ! -d "example" ]; then mkdir example && cd example; fi

author: AnthonyLzq
